home.title: YahuWellness (Deliverance)
home.subtitle: Walk in the authority Yahusha Ha Mashiach (יהושע המשיח) purchased for you
home.description: Deliverance ministry is not taboo. We believe that healing is the children's bread, and we make these resources accessible to all believers seeking freedom in Yahusha Ha Mashiach.
home.safetyText: These prayers are powerful and may cause manifestations, memories, or emotional releases. Use in safe, private settings only—not while driving or operating machinery. This resource is not a substitute for medical or psychological care. For serious spiritual warfare situations, consider seeking guidance from experienced deliverance ministers in your region.
home.takeAssessmentDesc: Identify bondages and doorways through guided self-evaluation
home.startDeliveranceDesc: Follow the 5-step process to walk in freedom
home.viewPrayersDesc: Access customizable prayers for renunciation and healing
home.trackProgressDesc: Your journey to freedom, step by step
home.scripture: If we confess our sins, He is faithful and just to forgive us our sins and to cleanse us from all unrighteousness.
home.encouragement: Deliverance is simple, voluntary, and rooted in Yahusha Ha Mashiach's victory on the cross. Christians can have demons (see Acts 8:13-23), and biblical deliverance is the pathway to lasting freedom. Speak everything out loud and invite the Ruach HaKodesh (רוח הקודש) to fill you afterward.
home.footerInspired: This ministry platform is dedicated to making biblical deliverance accessible to believers worldwide who seek freedom in Yahusha Ha Mashiach.
home.footerMission: Our mission is to equip the body of Messiah with practical spiritual warfare resources. All content is for educational and spiritual purposes only.
home.footerDisclaimer: Not a substitute for medical or psychological care.

prayers.title: Prayer Library
prayers.subtitle: Templates for renunciation and spiritual freedom
prayers.coreDeliveranceDesc: The foundational 5-step prayer with blanks for your assessment lists
prayers.forgivenessDesc: Prayers for releasing offenders and inviting Yahusha to mend soul wounds
prayers.bloodlineDesc: Advanced prayers for generational iniquities and family sins
prayers.coreSubtitle: Insert your assessment results into the bracketed sections below
prayers.step1: 1. Complete an assessment to generate your personalized list
prayers.step2: 2. Replace [INSERT YOUR LIST] with your specific items
prayers.step3: 3. Speak the entire prayer out loud in a safe, private setting
prayers.step4: 4. After completing, invite the Ruach HaKodesh to fill you

deliverance.title: Deliverance 101
deliverance.subtitle: The 5-Step Process to Freedom
deliverance.heroDesc: Deliverance is simple and faith-enforced. Speak everything out loud and follow these 5 steps to break agreements with every bondage identified in your assessments.
deliverance.rememberText: After completing the steps, invite the Ruach HaKodesh (Holy Spirit) to fill you. Avoid leaving a void. For longstanding issues, you may need to repeat the process.
deliverance.step1Desc: Acknowledge your sins before Yahuah (יהוה). Speak them out loud from your assessment list.
deliverance.step1Example: Father Yahuah, I confess that I have harbored anger and unforgiveness...
deliverance.step2Desc: Turn away from sin and receive grace. For non-consensual issues, focus on breaking victim agreements.
deliverance.step2Example: I repent for [list items] and receive Your grace to not turn back.
deliverance.step3Desc: Break all agreements with the sin, its fruit, its children, and its presence in your life.
deliverance.step3Example: I renounce anger and break all agreement with it, its fruit, its children...
deliverance.step4Desc: Bind every evil spirit that has operated in your life because of what you renounced.
deliverance.step4Example: I bind you in chains and fetters of iron...
deliverance.step5Desc: Command spirits to leave. If resistance, use brutal assault declarations with Yahuah's weapons.
deliverance.step5Example: You are severed, fired, and escorted to wherever Yahusha sends you. Get out!
deliverance.resistanceDesc: If spirits linger or resist removal after Step 5, engage in brutal spiritual assault using Yahuah's weapons:
deliverance.resistanceNote: Declare these weapons until all spirits relinquish their positions. Persistence is key!
deliverance.readyDesc: Complete an assessment first, then return here to apply the 5-step process with your personalized list.

assessments.title: Assessments
assessments.subtitle: Identify bondages through guided self-evaluation
assessments.description: These interactive evaluations help you identify specific sins, bondages, and spiritual doorways in your life. Your responses generate personalized lists that you'll use in renunciation prayers during the 5-step deliverance process.
assessments.tip1: • Be honest and thorough - Yahuah sees your heart
assessments.tip2: • Results can be saved in-app or emailed to you
assessments.tip3: • Retake assessments anytime as you grow
assessments.tip4: • You can 'lump under unrighteousness' for lengthy lists
assessments.surfaceDesc: Basic checklist for common sins and bondages. Perfect starting point if you're unsure where to begin.
assessments.bondagesDesc: Deeper dive into patterns like pharmakia, illicit relationships, and addictive behaviors.
assessments.traumaDesc: Address molestation, abuse, and their effects: bitterness, dissociation, and victimhood.
assessments.generationalDesc: Identify and confess family bloodline sins including occult involvement.
assessments.newAgeDesc: Covers tattoos, ascended masters, and spiritual pathways requiring renunciation.
assessments.advancedDesc: For alters, integration, vows, and persistent spiritual resistance.
assessments.doorwaysDesc: Comprehensive list of 600+ specific doorways across all categories.
assessments.altarsDesc: Identify spiritual altars and demonic dedication points requiring demolition.
